title: How to Build a Computer
description: Have you ever wanted to know how to build a computer yourself? This book titled, "How to Build a Computer (For Beginners)" ©  will teach you how to build a computer and has everything you need to know. This book has step by step instructions on how to build a computer from scratch. This book also contains questions and answers in the back great for educational use. This book is also a good reference book even if you are not a beginner.This book also teaches you how to budget yourself and save money on buying computer parts.  You can have fun teaching yourself and giving yourself the most fact filling mind blowing knowledge about computers if you're just learning for the first time. It is very easy to follow and easy to read.
author: John Gower III
